title: The Sea Gulls Woke Me
description: Jean is convinced she's the world's worst social misfit. Then she accepts a summer job at a Maine resort and her whole life changes. In a setting full of crisp cool air, white-capped waves, and gleaming sails, Mary Stolz's third novel presents once again very real young people dealing capably with their own problems and enjoyng themselves with all the enthusiasm and ingenuity of youth.
author: Mary Stolz
